metadata.title: CVE-2014-8439 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Adobe Flash Player before 13.0.0.258 and 14.x and 15.x before 15.0.0.239 onWindows and OS X and before 11.2.202.424 on Linux, Adobe AIR before15.0.0.293, Adobe AIR SDK before 15.0.0.302, and Adobe AIR SDK & Compilerbefore 15.0.0.302 allow attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause adenial of service (invalid pointer dereference) via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8439` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.424ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.424ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.424ubuntu0.14.04.1').
